front.title: P2P Streaming for Mobile Nodes: Scenarios and Related Issues

abstract.t: The scenarios where a Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP) containsmobile nodes need special considerations. An analysis of all thescenarios that involve mobile nodes is necessary to provide theguidelines to PPSP protocol design and applicability. This documentdescribes some key issues for a PPSP network with mobile nodes, andproposes some additional requirements for PPSP to handle thesescenarios.
